base_description: Rectangular object with brown and white colors.
part_description: The object has two brown ends and a white central section. It appears to be divided into three main parts with two brown segments at each end and a larger white section in the middle.
internal_interaction_description: The brown end sections are likely attached to the white central section, providing structural support. The white section may serve as the main body, while the brown ends could function as stabilizers or connectors. The parts are aligned linearly, suggesting a unified structure.
external_interaction_description: This object could interact with other components or systems, possibly serving as a base or support structure. Its shape suggests it could be used in mechanical or architectural applications, providing stability or connection between different elements.
